main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright red and white object estimated to be at a magnitude of 31e 34, visible for approximately 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 3/4 degree in diameter,The object was observed at an altitude above 20,000 feet and estimated to be traveling at 1,500 mph,Four boys in the Schenectady area also reported seeing 10 unidentified objects that were moving erratically and shooting rapid bright white flashes.,The Air Force was unable to identify the object and deemed the information insufficient for evaluation,There is a hand-drawn sketch indicating the motion and height of the object above the horizon.
sighted object: a bright red and white object
